definition: to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound
to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc)/to say repeatedly/to urge insistently/to ask repeatedly/to stick to a point/(onom.) tinkling or jingling sound
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: IT BEGAN on August 4th with the metallic clink of a few pots and pans.
sentences.chinese: 始于8月4日，几只铁罐和铁锅叮叮当当地响。

sentences.english: The white man laughed softly, jingled some coins in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 那白人轻轻一笑，把口袋里的硬币弄得叮叮当当直响。

sentences.english: A fresh cascade of splintered glass tinkled to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 大量刚裂开的玻璃碎片叮叮当当地落到地板上。

sentences.english: It is noisy burning clanging brass.
sentences.chinese: 它烧着黄铜叮叮当当的响。

definition: (onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
(onom.) for crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
variant of 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]
sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
